head.title: Woman Is Killed in a Fire

hedline.hl1: Woman Is Killed in a Fire

block.p: A woman was killed and a man was critically injured in a fire in an apartment building on the Upper East Side last night, police officials said.

The three-alarm fire began sometime before 10:20 p.m. on the top floor of the six-story building at 408 E. 65th Street, near First Avenue, said Detective Joseph Pentangelo, a Police Department spokesman. The cause was under investigation.
A woman was killed and a man was critically injured in a fire in an apartment building on the Upper East Side last night, police officials said.

The three-alarm fire began sometime before 10:20 p.m. on the top floor of the six-story building at 408 E. 65th Street, near First Avenue, said Detective Joseph Pentangelo, a Police Department spokesman. The cause was under investigation.
The police said they had not yet identified the the woman or the man, who was taken to Cornell Medical Center.
